author: fuankg
msg: Shift module extension into the makefile, so that win32 and netware might share the same ftpd.conf rewriter;
added default basedir to Makefile for 2.0.x line where we dont have it defined yet by build system;

author: rjung
msg: Use thread safe strtok_r on more platforms, especially AIX.
Detect multi threaded context using define _MT_CODE_PTHREAD
instead of _REENTRANT, which is not used on all platforms.

author: nandana
msg: Added a constructor which allows to specify a list of fault sub codes when creating an AxisFault

author: rjung
msg: Minor optimization: trim already returns strlen,
